name: Lilypad Days
description: In Lilypad Days, you play as Frankie - a down on their luck froggy stuck in lockdown after the animal kingdom is hit with a mysterious virus. At the behest of their parents, Frankie explores the complicated world of online dating with several critters of various sizes, shapes, and identities. This is a queer-positive game about mental health in the pandemic intended to be completed in 15-20 minutes.
